item.title: Automatic Development Environment Setup
item.description: How to Automate Development Environment Setup Starting from a fresh OS installation, manually installing and configuring a full development environment can take several days. Even then, it’s easy to forget some bit of configuration or forget to install some critical software. By following the GROWS everything in version control practice, it’s easy to save a ton of time and minimize disruption by automating the process. Most of the software I write is developed on Windows, so I decided to write the script using PowerShell and Chocolatey.
